pages.text: Their reward is with their Lord: Gardens of everlasting bliss, underneath which rivers flow, they will stay therein for ever, God pleased with them and they pleased with Him. That is for him who fears his Lord
When the earth is quaked with its quaking
and the earth brings out its weighty material
and man will say, “What ails her ?”
She will be made to tell her news on that day
because your Lord (would have) communicated to her
On that day human beings will be brought forth in diverse groups, to be shown their deeds
So whoever does good equivalent in weight, even to a small particle, will see it
And whoever does evil equivalent in weight, even to a small particle, will see it
By those that move fast breathing heavily
then those that strike fire striking
then those that raid at dawn
then penetrate into the midst of an assembly
Man is certainly ungrateful to his Lord
and he himself is a witness over that
And he certainly has intense love for good (worldly wealth)
Then does he not know, that when that which is in the graves is exposed
